titleStmt.title: Rebellion rebuked in an answer to a scandalous pamphlet entitled The Quaker converted to Christianity &c. written by one William Haworth ... and William Dimsdale ... / by John Crook, William Bayly.
titleStmt.author: Crook, John, 1617-1699.
Bayly, William, d. 1675.
Crisp, Stephen, 1628-1692.
Stout, Mary, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Includes comments on "The Quaker converted" from Stephen Crisp, Mary Stout, and a group of 11 Hartford Quakers.
Imperfect: Pages stained with some loss of print. British Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
